auth.groupAccessDescription: Part of a classroom or a team?

login.title: Welcome back!
login.error: An error has occurred during sign-in. Please check your details and try again! Reason:

groupaccess.instructions: Enter the code that you received
groupaccess.accountHint: You will receive a temporary, anonymous account without personal information. You can convert it into an actual account at any time after registration.
groupaccess.errorCodeNotFound: The access code you entered is not registered. Check your access card again or create your own account instead!
groupaccess.errorCodeNotActive: The access code you entered is invalid as this account has been deactivated. Please notify your instructor. If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact us at help@quantos.online.
groupaccess.errorCodeExpired: The access code you entered has expired. Check your access card again or create your own account instead!

welcomePage.title: Hi! Let's get started üöÄ
welcomePage.question: We'd like to ask you a few questions first to customize your user experience.

namePage.title: What's your name?
namePage.question: Leave this field blank if you don't want to be addressed by name.

accountTypePage.titleWithName: What type of account would you like to create, {{ userName }}?
accountTypePage.titleWithoutName: What type of account would you like to create?
accountTypePage.optionStudentDescription: Ideal for pupils, students and learning enthusiasts who want to find out more about quantum computing.
accountTypePage.optionTeacherDescription: Perfect for teachers and educators who supervise school classes, training courses or workshops. Enables the creation and management of access codes for participants.

agePage.title: How old are you?
agePage.description: This question is optional, but improves your learning experience.

experiencePage.title: How would you describe yourself?
experiencePage.description: That is, how familiar are you with quantum computing in general?

error.unknownErrorDialogText: Oops! It seems that something went wrong... Please notify your instructor and try again later. If the problem persists, please contact us at help@quantos.online.
